Sentencas: Hydrogen production for application to proton exchange membrane fuel cells (PEMFCs) has been a focus of investigation globally.
Titulo: Ethanol steam reforming over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 prepared via a glycine nitrate process

Sentencas: Ethanol as a H-2 source benefits from the ready availability of infrastructure and environmental benignity in comparison with those of other hydrocarbon fuels.
Titulo: Ethanol steam reforming over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 prepared via a glycine nitrate process

Sentencas: Thus, H-2 production from ethanol has gained much attention worldwide.
Titulo: Ethanol steam reforming over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 prepared via a glycine nitrate process

Sentencas: In this work, H-2 production from ethanol steam reforming (ESR) was investigated over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 (x = 0.2, 0.4, 0.6, or 0.8) developed via a glycine nitrate process.
Titulo: Ethanol steam reforming over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 prepared via a glycine nitrate process

Sentencas: The supports or catalysts were characterized by low temperature N-2 physical adsorption, powder X-ray diffraction (XRD), transmission electron microscopy (TEM), H-2 temperature-programmed reduction, temperature-programmed desorption of ethanol, and catalytic performance measurements for ESR at 350-550 degrees C. Initial catalyst stability was also investigated.
Titulo: Ethanol steam reforming over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 prepared via a glycine nitrate process

Sentencas: The results indicated that Pt/CexZr1-xO2 catalysts were highly active for ESR at lower temperatures, only yielding H-2, CO, CH4, and CO2 as products.
Titulo: Ethanol steam reforming over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 prepared via a glycine nitrate process

Sentencas: However, selectivity to CH4 was found around 50.0% at 350-400 degrees C, while selectivity of products at 450-550 degrees C was found close to thermodynamic control values, indirectly suggesting that ethanol first dehydrogenates on the metallic surface and then aldehyde undergoes decarbonylation, forming CO and CH4.
Titulo: Ethanol steam reforming over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 prepared via a glycine nitrate process

Sentencas: The function of steam was to establish thermodynamic equilibria for methane steam reforming and water gas shift reactions.
Titulo: Ethanol steam reforming over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 prepared via a glycine nitrate process

Sentencas: The high activity and good initial stability made the catalysts suitable for application to portable power generation by using a PEMFC combined with a solid oxide fuel cell or a methane internal combustion engine for capturing the energy in methane.
Titulo: Ethanol steam reforming over Pt catalysts supported on CexZr1-xO2 prepared via a glycine nitrate process
